name: GGscream
description: Extra! Extra! For the low price of $0,00 (zero dollars) you can acquire this phenomenal program that can be used in ANY game. Yes, you heard read that right, any game! This app allows you to configure a key to be pressed when you shout at your microphone! What are you waiting for? Download now (and don't forget to subscribe to @dosmecam, I even made a video about this app and it's pretty cool).
